titleStmt.title: SII 13.187: original edition by G.V. Srinivasa Rao
No. 187. (A.R. No. 202 of 1926.) ŚENDALAI, TANJORE TALUK, TANJORE DISTRICT. ON THE WEST WALL OF THE CENTRAL SHRINE, SUNDARĒŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This records an endowment of a vēli of land for the maintenance of a hall (ambalam) erected by him at Chandralēkhai-chaturvēdimaṅgalam, a brahmadēya in Ārkkāṭṭu-kūṟṟam, by Vayiramēgam Piḍāraṉ of Veṇṇāyil in Mīyśeṅgiḷi-nāḍu, after purchasing it tax-free from the Peruṅguṟi-sabhā of the place. The land was allotted in certain specified proportions for the following services in the ambalam: supply of drinking water (to the wayfarers) during summer, keeping the premises clean, supply of oil for a lamp, supply of earthen pots (for the water-shed); and for general periodical repairs. Vayiramēga was a surname of the Pallava king Dantivarman. This is probably a record of Āditya I (M.E.R. 1916, II, 7).

svasti śrī . korājakesaripanmarkku yāṇṭu 8 Eṭṭāvatu Ārkkāṭṭukūṟṟattu brahmadeyam cantralekhaica
turvedimaṅkalattu peruṅkuṟisabhaiyom miyceṅkiḷināṭṭu veṇṇāyiluṭaiyāṉ vayira mekam pi
ṭāraṉ Eṅkaḷūr Eṭuppitta Ampalattukku Ampalappuṟamāka viṟṟukuṭutta nilam Ivūr puṟam
pulattu veli Ivvelicceykku miypāṟkkellai tirunārāyaṇavatikku kiḻakku Ārkkāṭṭu vāykkā
lukku teṟkut tiruveḷḷaṟaivāykkālukku vaṭakku meṟkaṭaiya Araiye Orumā niykki Itaṉoṭumaṭai
yak kiḻakku kol viḻntavāṟṟāl tiṭal niykki viḷaivu veliccey Ampalappuṟamāka Emmili
cainta vilaipporuḷ kaiyyile Aṟak koṇṭu Ivvelicceyyum cantrādittavaṟ Iṟai Ili Ā
ka viṟṟuk kalmel veṭṭikkuṭuttom peruṅkuṟisabhaiyom Innilam Iṟaikāṭṭa paṇippār keṅ
kaiyiṭai kumariiṭai naṭuvu ceyitār ceyta pāpaṅ koḷvār Idhanmam rakṣippār śrīpātam En talaimelaṉa .
Innilam velicceyyilum Ivampalattu koṭaimātataṇṇir Aṭṭuvāṉukku nilam Eṭṭumāvum Ampalam me
ḻu(k)kuvārkku nilam Araikkālum viḷakkeṇṇai Aṭṭuvānukku kālum kalam I(ṭ)ṭum kucavanukku Orumāvarai putukkupuṟa munṟumāvum .
